alert.note: Alert for Horry; Marion (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 5:58PM EDT until July 14 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Horry County in northeastern South Carolina... Central Marion County in northeastern South Carolina... * Until 645 PM EDT. * At 558 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Horry, or 12 miles northwest of Conway, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Horry, Pee Dee Crossroads, Brittons Neck and Aynor. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
